thread.title: John Hamment

author: John Hamment
title: John Hamment
text: This is our third house sit with Trusted Housesitters and each one has been great. We have stayed in some lovely parts of uk and Trusted Housesitters has allowed us to visit many places we would never have seen. The pets we have cared for have been most friendly as have the owners. We would certainly recommend Trusted Housesitters to all who would like to visited different parts of the world affordably.
